{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with BRS INNOVATIONS.

Across 17 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (29%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 226% and the average number of amendments was 1.8. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.7M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.25 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$413.4K. The longest contract was 3.37 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$5.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
